summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of Melrose Avenue and Melrose Avenue North, from Pine Street to Roy Street; by construction of watermains together with fire hydrants and the necessary appurtenances and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 8254 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
